alert.note: Alert for Mecosta; Newaygo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:01PM EDT until August 29 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Newaygo County in west central Michigan... Western Mecosta County in central Michigan... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 301 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near White Cloud, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Big Rapids... Newaygo... White Cloud... Fremont... Hesperia... Grant... Morley... Croton... Bridgeton... Paris... Stanwood... Brohman... Woodland Park... Rodney... Reeman... Hawkins... Woodville... Roben-Hood Airport... Bitely... Chippewa Lake... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
